name: The Dark - The Forbidden Story
description:
Welcome to The Forbidden Story. In the game you will discover what the Blue-air project has done to humanity , you will discover paths including secret walls that you'll have to progress through to escape the chapters.

This game was originally released in 2010 and was released before Dark Light Games as a developer was formed. As of this, there is no reference to "Dark Light Games" as the owner. In order to keep its originality, nothing has been altered since original release.

http://darklightgames.co.uk/
